feed.title: LinuxGSM Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LinuxGSM: v25.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: upgrade docker containers to ubuntu 24.04 by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4669
  • fix: update license reference by @emmanuel-ferdman in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4678
  • fix(fctrserver): parse updated version string correctly by @Amlinde in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4688
  • feat: User interface refactor by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4716
  • fix(q3): Fix q3-only typo in install_config.sh by @tlbjr in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4709
  • fix(sf): add tcp gameport to details by @h3o66 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4681
  • fix(papermc): update API URL to prevent update failures by @Zechiax in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4728
  • fix(sm): remove config install as it is not used by @h3o66 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4730
  • Update license copyright year(s) by @github-actions in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4726
  • fix(st): resolve Stationeers config issues by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4733
  • feat: add extra check for jq by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4731
  • fix(mc): correct the of counting players online on Minecraft servers via gamedig by @codingWithJimmy in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4736
  • fix(sof2): correct config location by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4739
  • feat(bfv): add query for bfv by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4740
  • feat(squad44): Rename Post Scriptum to Squad 44 by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4737
  • feat: add ismygameserver.online links by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4742
  • Release v25.1.0 by @dgibbs64 in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4757

New Contributors

  • @emmanuel-ferdman made their first contribution in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4678
  • @Amlinde made their first contribution in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4688
  • @tlbjr made their first contribution in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4709
  • @Zechiax made their first contribution in https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/pull/4728

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GameServerManagers/LinuxGSM/compare/v24.3.4...v25.1.0
